items.sentence: I\'ve decided not to do that until Tom gets here.
Tom picked it up quicker than I thought he would.
Tom picked up his bag and walked out of the room.
Tom picked up the knife and looked at it closely.
Tom picked up the saltshaker and salted his eggs.
Tom pitched the tent while Mary started the fire.
I don\'t even know if Tom went to college or not.
I don\'t have time to answer all those questions.
Tom was convicted in 2013 for his wife\'s murder.
I don\'t want you to tell me what I already know.
